content.description: Unprotectable start to horizontal crack and crumbly ledge. Pull through a .75 small crack section to main ledge below summit block. Climb flakes to summit and a single piton (see photo).
content.protection: A few off fingers to hand sized cams. Offset nuts were helpful. A tricam could be used in a pocket as well. There’s a single piton on top. We had to simul rap on opposing sides to get off.
content.location: Start on west side of formation on top of a boulder. The first 15 feet are unprotectable. There’s a bolted route 15 feet to the left.

content.description: Small granite boulder pile east of Sven’s Slab on the way to Rosetta Stone and Granite Ballroom.
